tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (CC And) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ fat) (NN ass) (JJ painful) (NN bruise)) (PP (IN on) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN hand)))) (. !)))
